data.name: ModuleHelp.Text
data.value:
About Package Install

Allows you to upload and install packages to the website.

data.name: NoFile.Text
data.value: You need to select a file to upload first - click the Choose File button to locate the file on your local file system.

data.value: Install New {0} Extension

data.name: AcceptLicense.Text
data.value: Accept License?

data.name: Introduction.Help
data.value: DotNetNuke can be extended in many ways. This wizard helps you upload and install DotNetNuke extension packages.

data.name: Introduction.Title
data.value: Upload New Extension Package

data.name: ZipCriticalError.Text
data.value: Critical error reading zip package

data.value: Error reading the zip package - see below

data.value: You must accept the terms of the license in order to install this package.

data.name: InstallError.Text
data.value: Error loading files from temporary folder - see below

data.name: InstallResults.Help
data.value: See below for the results of the package installation

data.value: Package Installation Report

data.name: PackageInfo.Help
data.value: The following information was found in the package manifest.

data.value: Package Information

data.name: License.Help
data.value: Before proceeding you must accept the terms of the license for this extension. Please review the license and check the checkbox marked "Accept License?"

data.name: License.Title
data.value: Review License

data.name: ReleaseNotes.Help
data.value: You can review the Release Notes for this package.

data.name: ReleaseNotes.Title
data.value: Release Notes

data.name: IgnoreWhiteList.Text
data.value: Ignore File Restrictions?

data.name: IgnoreRestrictedFilesWarning.Text
data.value: WARNING: You have elected to ignore the check for restricted file types. This action poses a possible security risk for your site, and you should only do this if the package you are installing is from a trusted source.

data.name: RepairInstall.Text
data.value: Repair Install?

data.name: InvalidFiles.Text
data.value: The package contains files with invalid File Extensions ({0})

data.name: PackageInstalled.Text
data.value: The package is already Installed.

data.name: RepairInstallWarning.Text
data.value: WARNING: You have selected to repair the installation of this package. This will cause the files in the package to overwrite all the files that were previously installed.

data.name: Return.Text
data.value: Return

data.name: LegacySkin.Text
data.value: Legacy Theme/Container:

data.name: NoManifest.Text
data.value: This package does not appear to be a valid DotNetNuke Extension as it does not have a manifest. Old (legacy) Themes and Containers do not contain manifests. If this package is a legacy Theme or Container Package please check the appropriate radio button below, and click Next.

data.name: Container.Text
data.value: Container

data.name: None.Text
data.value: Not a Theme/Container

data.name: Skin.Text
data.value: Theme

data.name: CoreLanguageError.Text
data.value: The core language for which this language pack is designed is not installed. Install the core language pack before you install any extension language packs for that language.

data.name: DependencyError.Text
data.value: This language pack is designed for an extension that does not appear to be installed.

data.name: IgnoreWhiteListHelp.Text
data.value: The installer maintains a list of allowable files (whitelist) that can be installed into your site. If you are confident that the package you are installing is from a reliable source then you can elect to ignore this list.

data.name: LegacySkinHelp.Text
data.value: Legacy Themes and Containers can be installed using this installer, but as they do not have manifests you must identify that the package is a Legacy Theme or Container (if you are not sure if the Theme/Container is a legacy Theme/Container then check the appropriate option anyway).

data.name: RepairInstallHelp.Text
data.value: By default the installer will not overwrite the same Package/Version. If you would like the Installer to continue and to repair the current installed version then check this box. Otherwise you will not be able to proceed any further with this installation.

data.name: BrowseFile.Text
data.value: Browse for File:

data.name: BrowseFileHelp.Text
data.value: Use the Choose File button to browse your local file system to find the extension package you wish to install, then click Next to continue.

data.name: Warnings.Help
data.value: If you have reached this page it is because the installer needs to gather some more information, before proceeding.

data.name: Warnings.Title
data.value: Upload Results

data.name: AcceptLicense.Help
data.value: Check this box to accept the terms of the license.

data.name: ControlTitle_install.Text
data.value: Install Extension

data.name: FileSizeRestriction.Text
data.value: Your site is configured with a maximum file upload size of {0} MB.

data.name: AzureCompact.Text
data.value: Install Extension without Windows Azure SQL Database verification anyway?

data.name: AzureCompactHelp.Text
data.value: This site uses Windows Azure SQL Database for database storage, and the package you are currently installing has not been verified by the owner to be compatible with Windows Azure SQL Database. If a non-compatible extension is installed, it can stop successful backups and restores of the database, and can cause run-time errors once the extension is in use. You may continue the installation process if you have verified the compatibility of the extension yourself, or click Cancel and contact the owner of the Extension to ask for an Azure SQL Database compatible version.

data.name: AzureCompactMessage.Text
data.value: This package is not verified to be compatible with Azure SQL Database.

data.name: AzureCompactWarning.Text
data.value: WARNING: You have selected to install the package without Windows Azure SQL Database verification.

data.name: NoAzureCompactHelp.Text
data.value: This site uses Windows Azure SQL Database for database storage, and the package you are currently installing has been verified by the owner to be incompatible with Windows Azure SQL Database. Please click 'Cancel' to end the installation process.

data.name: NoAzureCompactMessage.Text
data.value: This package is not compatible with the Windows Azure SQL Database.
